title: za’atar spice recipe
directions: Mix all the ingredients together in a small bowl. Store in an airtight container.
For the most flavor, toast whole seeds ( umin and coriander seeds) until fragrant, then grind.
This will make the most flavorful zaatar. If you don’t have whole seeds, feel free to use ground spices.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon dried thyme- crushed ( or sub oregano)
¼ teaspoon or more aleppo chili flakes- optional
